importWizard.sampleFileDescription: If you don't have a sample xls or csv file to test Import Feature, you can download sample file.
importWizard.mappingDescription: You can map related fields to your columns with Import Mapping Feature. Drop down fields generate by your csv or xlsx file.You should map your file columns with module's fields.
importWizard.mappingNote: Note: you should config your fields in Model as $import_fields.
importWizard.pleaseWaitText: It may take a few minutes
